body_html: This is what the header looks like. If there are any suggestions on how to make more prominent: feel free to add it to the remote branch (you can check out it out locally with git checkout origin/feature/project-proposals (if you have checked out the repo directly, otherwise it's probably upstream instead of origin)

body:
This is what the header looks like. If there are any suggestions on how to make more prominent: feel free to add it to the remote branch (you can check out it out locally with `git checkout origin/feature/project-proposals` (if you have checked out the repo directly, otherwise it's probably `upstream` instead of `origin`)
